battle.title: Battle
battle.crit-ko-message-1: {loser} gets absolutely destroyed with this attack! Double damage!
battle.crit-ko-message-2: {loser}'s jaw was cracked with a perfect shot! Double damage!
battle.purple-0-stars-lose-message: {loserName}'s {loserMove} was ineffective because it has 0 stars! {winnerName}'s {winnerMove} breaks through with ease!
battle.purple-0-stars-draw-message: {zerpmonName}'s {moveName} was ineffective because it has 0 stars!
battle.survive-trigger-message: Woah! {zerpmonName} seemingly comes back to life with its {equipmentName}!
battle.stars-reduce-trigger-message: Reduced {zerpmonName}'s Purple stars to {newStars} for the rest of the combat!
battle.damage-increased-trigger-message: {zerpmonName}'s damage is increased by {value} for the next {activeRounds}!
battle.damage-decreased-trigger-message: {zerpmonName}'s damage is decreased by {value} for the next {activeRounds}!
battle.meteor-trigger-message: Out of nowhere, a giant meteor lands right on top of üíÄ {loserName} üíÄ!
battle.crit-ko-message-3: {loser} gets hit directly in their weak spot! Double damage!
battle.crit-ko-message-4: The attack hit right where it hurts most. {loser}'s collection of rare berries! Double damage!
battle.crit-ko-message-5: The attack lands directly on {loser}'s face! Double damage!
battle.crit-ko-message-6: Oooof, even Elite 4 Link can't stand to watch that! {loser} felt that in their pride! Double damage!
battle.crit-ko-message-7: Oooof, even Elite 4 Reiko can't stand to watch that! {loser} felt that in their pride! Double damage!
battle.crit-ko-message-8: {loser} failed to put up their defences properly and took a major blow to their ego! Double damage!
battle.crit-ko-message-9: That attack just demolished {loser}'s subscription to "How to be a Fierce Warrior" magazine! Double damage!
battle.crit-ko-message-10: Ouchhhh! I don't think {loser} can breed anymore after that attack! Double damage!
